meanings.definition: The state of being slightly intoxicated or drunk.
meanings.sent1: After a few sips of wine, she felt the tipsinesses creeping in.
meanings.sent2: His tipsinesses was evident as he stumbled slightly on the dance floor.
meanings.sent3: The tipsinesses of the party guests led to some hilarious dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The tipsinesses of the night enveloped the room like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The tipsinesses of the celebration lingered long after the last guest had left.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being tipsy.
meanings.sent1: The tipsinesses of the wine made her cheeks flush with warmth.
meanings.sent2: His tipsinesses was evident in his slurred speech.
meanings.sent3: The tipsinesses of the evening added a touch of silliness to their conversation.
meanings.sent4: The tipsinesses of the room seemed to sway gently with the music.
meanings.sent5: The tipsinesses of the atmosphere made everything seem a bit more magical.
